about_the_game:
Description:

Logic Grid Puzzle is a multilingual logical deduction game in which you have to find out the details of different stories based on different statements and facts.

You have to mark a part of the puzzle with the help of the facts on the field, while a larger part you have to find out based on the information available to you.

In the game, you can encounter puzzles of various difficulty levels, starting from the simplest to the most challenging ones.

The difficulty of the puzzles is determined by the size of the puzzle to be solved. The medium difficulty level is 3x3x3, but the game starts from 1x1 (easy) puzzle to 4x4x5 (extreme) difficulty.

So everyone can find the right level of challenge for them.

Main features of the game:

  • 100+ puzzles. (50+ in English and 50+ in Hungarian)

- 41 unlockable achievements

- 3 game modes: Relaxing, Normal, Difficult

- 8 color theme setting options including themes for colorblind people.

- 2 Interactive tutorials for learning the game's management and game rules.

- Measurement of statistics related to solved puzzles, achievements and playing time.

- Support for any puzzle size, from 1x1 to 4x4x

- Support for puzzles in English and Hungarian.

- Since all puzzles are available in pairs, they can also be used to practice language learning in a fun way.

- 3 selectable pleasant background music, while solving the puzzles.

- QoL Functions for solving puzzles: SmartFill, in-game help request and control option.

- Filtering option regarding the difficulty, language, and content of the puzzles.

The game is named after the famous scientist Albert Einstein, who originally created the very first puzzle.

The game is also known by several names such as:

- Logic Grid Puzzle

- Zebra Puzzle

- Einstein's Riddle

Are you ready for the challenge?

Prove it!

name: Logic Grid Puzzle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Logic Grid Puzzle is a multilingual story-driven logical deduction game in which you have to discover the whole story by using partially given facts.A pleasant yet challenging recreation for lovers of logical games and mystery-solving games.Are you ready for the challenge?
